title: Barbara Ann Kinney
content:
, age 73, of Franklin, entered into rest Friday, Sept. 11, 2015 at her residence. 
  
Arrangements are under the direction of Crafton Funeral Home. There will be no public visitation or funeral service held. Burial will follow at a later date in Lucasville Cemetery in Lucasville, Ohio. 
      
 She graduated from Portsmouth High School in 1960 and was retired from Lifeline after 20 years. She was also a member of the Ladies Auxiliary at the American Legion in Franklin. She was preceded in death by her son, David Fleming. 
 
 She is survived by her mother, Catherine Phipps of Franklin; her daughters, Jeannie Fleming Lamont of Franklin and Nancy Fleming of Savannah, Georgia; two grandsons, Jeffery B. Collins of Franklin and Jonathan Lewis of Bowling Green and four great- grandchildren. 
 
Online condolences may be made at www.craftonfu  neralhome.com .
